overview: Worlds collide when Riley Reid gets home from her late father`s funeral. In low spirits, her stepmother Ashley Fires tells her that everything she knows, has been a lie. As Riley discovers what really happened in her father`s journal, she is transported back in time to when her parents were just budding teens, eager to throw caution to the wind, enjoying the sexual fervor of the 80s. She discovers that Ashley is not her ream mom, and upon her return, she takes advantage of her visceral lesbian attraction by tasting her sweet MILF pussy. Kenna James needs a break form her boyfriend but doesn`t realize it. In a fit of rage, she casts a spell that gets her into a load of trouble. Her stepmother Angela Sommers falls victim to her intentions and gets Kenna into bed, only to have the whole deal reciprocated when Kenna naively reverses the spell, setting herself on her unsuspecting stepmother and her soft MILF body!
title: Flashback
